welcome.353989806516207616: [Bot]: Welcome to $GUILD $USER! Drop some info about yourself in <#354675280578609162> ^_^

commands.react?(s|ing)?( .+|$): function(msg){msg.content=msg.content.replace(new RegExp('^'+bot.prefix,''),'');if(msg.author.id==clt.user.id){if(/(s|ing)$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<')}else if(/t$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.reactspam).toString())){if(bot.reacts.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.reacts.push(msg.channel.id)}msg.channel.reactspam=true}else{bot.reacts.rmv(msg.channel.id);msg.channel.reactspam=false}msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<');sav()}else{if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.reactspam).toString())){if(bot.reacts.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.reacts.push(msg.channel.id)}}else{bot.reacts.rmv(msg.channel.id)}sav();msg.delete()}}else{msg.reply(msg.channel.reactspam?'I react! ^_^':'I don\'t react! >.<')}}
commands.vote?(s|ing)?( .+)?: function(msg){msg.content=msg.content.replace(new RegExp('^'+bot.prefix,''),'');if(msg.author.id==clt.user.id){if(/(s|ing)$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<')}else if(/e$/i.test(msg.content.split(' ')[0])){if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.votespam).toString())){if(bot.vote.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.vote.push(msg.channel.id)}msg.channel.votespam=true}else{bot.vote.rmv(msg.channel.id);msg.channel.votespam=false}msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<');sav()}else{if(!falseReg.test(msg.content.split(' ')[1]||(!msg.channel.votespam).toString())){if(bot.vote.indexOf(msg.channel.id)<0){bot.vote.push(msg.channel.id)}}else{bot.vote.rmv(msg.channel.id)}sav();msg.delete()}}else{msg.reply(msg.channel.votespam?'I vote! ^_^':'I don\'t vote! >.<')}}
